description:
Legends tell of a creature capable of shedding its skin and taking other forms at its pleasure. This ability, this gift of transformation, has fascinated humanoids since the first bipedals walked on land.
It was these legends that inspired the creation of the Selkie. 
Fitted with a universal interface system, as well as a revolutionary modular component framework, the Selkie provides its crew with the unique ability to refit the vessel rapidly and with great ease. With but an hour’s work, a mining crew could go from gathering gas in Sol, to mining crystals in Kronos.

ship_ability.title: Universal Mining Laser
ship_ability.description:
When mining 6⇵ and below Gas, Crystal, and Ore, the Selkie's mining speed is increased by {value}.

Research Adapting Skin (found in the Combat Tree) to increase the Selkie's ability to survive in Hazard Systems.
